channel.title: Cache Downloading problems (Plz Help) 317 Easy?
channel.description: Okay so i've done some work too try and get my Rsps running so i could host for some friends and hopefully put up for other too, but when my friend try's too open the jar. file for the client it cannot find the cache for the game. Now the question is how can i get the file too unload the cache too run the game. :confused: i'm not sure where to locate and change up the thread for it. anyone help me?

item.title: Cache Downloading problems (Plz Help) 317 Easy?
item.dc:creator: @Fireweaver0 Fireweaver0
item.description:
@Fireweaver0 wrote:

In my case I had to upload all the cache files and sprites into the same folder. For some reason my extraction would not pull from another directory. Where are you uploading your cache? (Be sure to use the public folder if using dropbox).

Read full topic

item.title: Cache Downloading problems (Plz Help) 317 Easy?
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

It was a .zip not a .rar correct?

Read full topic
